00029 #ifndef _AP4_TYPES_H_
00030 #define _AP4_TYPES_H_
00031 
00032 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 |   includes
00034 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00035 #include "Ap4Config.h"
00036 
00037 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 |   types
00039 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00040 typedef int            AP4_Result;
00041 typedef unsigned int   AP4_Flags;
00042 typedef unsigned int   AP4_Mask;
00043 typedef unsigned int   AP4_Cardinal;
00044 typedef unsigned int   AP4_Ordinal;
00045 typedef unsigned int   AP4_TimeStamp;
00046 typedef unsigned long  AP4_Duration;
00047 typedef unsigned int   AP4_UI32;
00048 typedef signed   int   AP4_SI32;
00049 typedef unsigned short AP4_UI16;
00050 typedef signed   short AP4_SI16;
00051 typedef unsigned char  AP4_UI08;
00052 typedef unsigned char  AP4_Byte;
00053 typedef unsigned long  AP4_Size;
00054 
00055 // the rest depends on whether the platform supports 64-bit integers
00056 #if defined(AP4_CONFIG_HAVE_INT64)
00057     // we have 64-bit integers (not handled yet)
00058     typedef AP4_CONFIG_INT64_TYPE          AP4_SI64;
00059     typedef unsigned AP4_CONFIG_INT64_TYPE AP4_UI64;
00060     typedef unsigned AP4_CONFIG_INT64_TYPE AP4_LargeSize;
00061     typedef AP4_CONFIG_INT64_TYPE          AP4_Offset;
00062     typedef unsigned AP4_CONFIG_INT64_TYPE AP4_Position;
00063 #else
00064     // use only 32-bit integers
00065     typedef struct {
00066         AP4_UI32 hi;
00067         AP4_UI32 lo;
00068     } AP4_UI64, AP4_SI64;
00069     typedef unsigned long  AP4_LargeSize;
00070     typedef long           AP4_Offset;
00071     typedef unsigned long  AP4_Position;
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 #ifndef NULL
00075 #define NULL 0
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 #endif // _AP4_TYPES_H_
